name: Sonic Color Cursed
summary: Sonic Color Cursed is a 2D speed based platformer, inspired by the Genesis classics with a 1-bit artstyle! Dr. Eggman is up to his antics again and this time he’s stolen all the color from the planet! Sonic and friends will have to put an end to Eggman’s plans with flying colors! Or else the world will forever cease to have color! There are RGB scales for you to adjust to have your own shade of the game. You can also enable colored outlines for important objects!
